description: Create a step in the migration workflow.

parameters.name: stepGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the step group.

parameters.name: workflowId
parameters.description: The ID of the migration workflow.

parameters.name: stepActionType
parameters.description: The action type of the step. You must run and update the status of a manual step for the workflow to continue after the completion of the step.

parameters.name: workflowStepAutomationConfiguration
parameters.description: The custom script to run tests on source or target environments. scriptLocationS3Bucket (string) --- The Amazon S3 bucket where the script is located. scriptLocationS3Key (dict) --- The Amazon S3 key for the script location. linux (string) --- The script location for Linux. windows (string) --- The script location for Windows. command (dict) --- The command required to run the script. linux (string) --- Command for Linux. windows (string) --- Command for Windows. runEnvironment (string) --- The source or target environment. targetType (string) --- The servers on which to run the script.

nested_params.name: scriptLocationS3Bucket
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 bucket where the script is located.

nested_params.name: scriptLocationS3Key
nested_params.description: The Amazon S3 key for the script location.

nested_params.name: command
nested_params.description: The command required to run the script.

nested_params.name: targetType
nested_params.description: The servers on which to run the script.

parameters.name: stepTarget
parameters.description: The servers on which a step will be run. (string) ---

parameters.name: outputs
parameters.description: The key value pairs added for the expected output. (dict) --- The output of a step. name (string) --- The name of the step. dataType (string) --- The data type of the output. required (boolean) --- Determine if an output is required from a step. value (dict) --- The value of the output. integerValue (integer) --- The integer value. stringValue (string) --- The string value. listOfStringValue (list) --- The list of string value. (string) ---

nested_params.name: dataType
nested_params.description: The data type of the output.

nested_params.name: required
nested_params.description: Determine if an output is required from a step.

nested_items.name: stepGroupId
nested_items.description: The ID of the step group.

nested_items.name: workflowId
nested_items.description: The ID of the migration workflow.
